co.uk.niadel.mpi.common.items

Class ItemModToolBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.minecraft.item.Item
      • net.minecraft.item.ItemTool
        • co.uk.niadel.mpi.common.items.ItemModToolBase

  • public class ItemModToolBase
extends net.minecraft.item.ItemTool
    Allows for tools from mods. Exists for the same reason as ItemBaseModArmour.
    Author:
    Daniel1
